mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category(user_id, catalog, name, description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{catalog}, #{name}, #{description}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM category WHERE id = #{id} and user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category WHERE catalog = 'questionnaire' AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2}, '%') AND user_id = #{param1} ORDER BY updated_at DESC
